title: Soaring Exchange Rates: Will the 'Korea-US Currency Swap' Be a Solution?…BOK Says "Policy Evaluation Needed"
description: [Asia Economy Reporter Seo So-jeong] As the won-dollar exchange rate has rapidly risen in a short period, debates surrounding the conclusion of the 'Korea-US currency swap' are heating up. Since the effects of the Korea-US currency swap were felt during the 2008 global financial crisis and the March...
